akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2781. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519
Section, Pub. L. 88–452, title II, § 201, Aug. 20, 1964, 78 Stat. 516; Pub. L. 90–222, title I, § 104, Dec. 23, 1967, 81 Stat. 690; Pub. L. 94–341, § 2(a)(6), July 6, 1976, 90 Stat. 803, set forth Congressional statement of purpose for urban and rural community action programs.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1981, see section 9912(a) of this title, prior to the general amendment of chapter 106 (§ 9901 et seq.) of this title by Pub. L. 105–285.
